description: French President Emmanuel Macron said that France, Germany and the UK would present a diplomatic offer to Iran in an attempt to halt the escalating conflict between Tehran and Tel Aviv.

The American GBU-57 bomb is the only weapon capable of reaching Iran's Fordo nuclear site
description: The Israeli military does not possess the necessary means to destroy the uranium enrichment facilities at the underground Fordo site. The American GBU-57, a highly powerful bunker-busting bomb, was specifically designed for that purpose.

headline: Chinese cities are facing the financial abyss of their subway systems
description: After high-speed rail, subway lines are now dragging the cities they serve into huge levels of debt. This is due to colossal construction and operating costs, minimal revenues and a toxic relationship with real estate developers.

headline: How Trump broke with his strategic allies to side with Russia over Ukraine
description: 'The Transatlantic Divorce' (5/5). After Barack Obama stepped back during the 2014 annexation of Crimea and Joe Biden hesitated, Donald Trump, now back in the White House, aligned himself with Russia at the UN and left his strategic allies alone to face Vladimir Putin.

headline: 'Iran's nuclear obsession could lead to endless, if not fatal, weakening of the Islamic Republic'
description: The war that Israel is waging in Iran is the culmination of a cycle that began nearly 40 years ago, during the early days of Iran's theocracy, writes Le Monde's columnist Alain Frachon.

Limiting global warming to 1.5°C is now impossible
description: According to a group of scientists, the target set by the 2015 Paris Agreement can no longer be met due to the inability of countries to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

headline: War in Ukraine has been a social elevator for part of the Russian population
description: A study by the French Institute of International Relations (IFRI) examines the war in Ukraine's socio-economic impact, from the jobs created by the military-industrial complex to salaries and bonuses distributed to soldiers.

headline: Why Paris's Centre Pompidou, not even 50 years old, must close for five years
description: The building designed by Renzo Piano and Richard Rogers is set to undergo major renovations until 2030 in order to reduce its energy consumption by 40%. Since its opening in 1977, the space has been in constant transformation.
